2010-07-06

30 Days of Buffy: Day 1: Favorite Season

Not convinced I'll make it through this but as Hazel's doing it I thought I'd give it a shot (one day after her)...

Day 1: Favorite Season
My favourite season is I guess dictated by characters rather than story so I'm going to pick Season 3 because of Faith and Mayor Wilkins and because at the end the school gets destroyed.
